sentence.Network_en: The escort and the universal watchfulness had completely isolated him.
sentence.Network_cn: 护送和普遍一致的监视曾经使他完全孤立.

sentence.Network_en: A due watchfulness on the movements of the enemy was maintained.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对敌人的行动还是相当警惕的.

sentence.Network_en: These are not the only points to which you look for vigilant watchfulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些并非是诸位选择机警的看守者的唯一条件.
